law.catch_line: Agreement upon party to undertake acquisition of ferries.
law.text: Should the Commonwealth of Kentucky, or any agency, commission or administrative body thereof, join with any other state or any agency, commission or administrative body thereof for the purpose of constructing any bridge or bridges as referred to in KRS 180.272 to 180.278, the parties to such joint venture or undertaking shall agree as to which of them shall proceed to acquire a ferry or ferries, as referred to in KRS 180.276.
